name: Weechat documentation for small screens
description: This is intended to make .../files/docs/ more readable in netbooks or narrow windows, but it currently applies to the whole /files/ section so as to make it easier on the eyes. If that breaks anything let me know and I'll narrow the url rule.
additional_info:
Weechat docs style for small screens or night browsing.

Removes padding, make the Table of Contents slim for netbooks
and other small screens. I often put weechat on one half of the
screen and the documentation on the other half. It gets cramped.

Also this darkens the white background to pastel colors.
